name: Starcraft: Time Splitters
author: wingedarchon
description:
## Preface.

This campaign is my first attempt for a project telling a story within the realm of SC2 and consisting of multiple singleplayer maps. I hope that I can provide you [player, streamer, watcher] with a fun and enjoyable experience.
I also hope my mapmaking skills and time allow me to bring out the maps I want to tell within the story set for this campaign.

Also, should you encounter problems due to Blizzard updates or other, please let me know about them, then I'll try to fix all I can.

------

![](https://image.ibb.co/jjdJDo/SC_TS_M1_P1_Intro.jpg)

 

## Starcraft: Time Splitters

The campaign will be set in the style of Time Splitters, and will introduce the [Protoss Talon faction](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/wingedarchon-assets/pages/wingedarchon-downloads-hub/protoss-factions/talon) as a playable race that is at the center of this campaign.

## Story

[History]

While their history among the Protoss is largely shrouded in mystery, recorded history shows that the Talon have always been present at the beginning of momentous events, mostly resulting in a war-torn Protoss society. Near the end of the Aeon of Strife when Adun introduced the Khala, the Talon were amongst those who vicously opposed it. Even before the exile of the Nerazim, most of the Talon left Aiur in several supercarriers in order to found a new civilization of their own. Amongst those which were left behind they merged themselves in with the Nerazim and Tal'Darim in order to learn and gather intel.

[Time Splitters]

For decades the Talon have kept a shroud of silence around their existence ever since. Many of the mysteriously vanished expeditionary teams of Protoss and terrans alike are the result of relentless destruction by the Talon. However, while there were always tensions between the various subfactions of the Talon, during the last year tensions grew exponentially, leaving the Talon at the edge of a civil war. This story begins on a small backwater planet, where the Annual Combat Event -a yearly ritual for the establishment of Talon rule- is on the verge to begin...

 

## How to install and play

### ![](https://i.ibb.co/1TBRk0k/Wrench.jpg)Installing the maps

1. Download the mission maps and the launcher [here](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-time-splitters/files).
2. Unzip the zip-files.
3. Copy the xxx.sc2map files within the unzipped folders and follow below instructions
4. Open your SC2 directory [by default it should be C:/Program Files/Starcraft II/ ]
5. Open the Maps folder within your SC2 directory. If this folder does not exist, create a new folder and name it Maps.
6. Inside the Maps folder, create a new folder with the name: SCTimeSplitters.
7. Paste the xxx.sc2map files inside the SCTimeSplitters folder.

### ![](https://i.ibb.co/1TBRk0k/Wrench.jpg)Installing the mod

1. Download the mod [here](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-time-splitters/files).
2. Unzip the zip-file.
3. Copy the Talon_Faction_Mod.sc2mod file within the unzipped folder and follow below instructions
4. Open your SC2 directory [by default it should be C:/Program Files/Starcraft II/ ]
5. Open the Mods folder within your SC2 directory. If this folder does not exist, create a new folder and name it Mods.
6. Paste the Talon_Faction_Mod.sc2mod file inside the Mods folder.

### ![](https://i.ibb.co/vsTBgQ8/Gameon.jpg) Play the Campaign

1. Open the launcher through the editor
2. Start the launcher with the Test Document function.
3. After loading the map: select from the screen and... poof!

Note: Make sure Legacy Of The Void is installed for best performance.

## Features

- A new playable faction featuring new and unique units and characters.
- Lots of new models
- Maps with cutscenes and storytelling.

## Missions

### Released

- Prologue: The Talon [part1]
- Prologue: The Talon [part2]

### Planned

- Mission 1: Bionical *(under construction)*
- Mission 2: The Autonomous Sword
- Mission 3: The Rite
- Mission 4: Crisis on Planet X
- Mission X: Convergence *(postponed in mission order)*

## The campaign in Russian

[Hobot Productions](/linkout?remoteUrl=https%253a%252f%252fvk.com%252fhobot_productions) have translated the campaign into russian"check it out here: 

- [Main page link](/linkout?remoteUrl=https%253a%252f%252fvk.com%252ftopic-96326532_39665593)
- [Direct download link](/linkout?remoteUrl=https%253a%252f%252fyadi.sk%252fd%252fF4QdNwnECGpsSg)

## Feedback

[Campaign Feedback Page

](https://www.sc2mapster.com/forums/player-zone/map-feedback/234707-starcraft-time-splitters-campaign-feedback)Please use the link above to leave feedback on the campaign for improvement of the missions.

## Credits and Special thanks

In no particular order,

- [DaveSpectre122](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/DaveSpectre122)
- [DudkiSC2](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/DudkiSC2)
- [Edhriano](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/EDHRIANO)
- [TChosenOne](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/TChosenOne)
- [VastanX](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/VastanX)
- [Deltron](https://www.sc2mapster.com/members/Deltron) @ DeltronLive

...Page will be updated timely.

maps.name: Prologue: The Talon [part 2] V5
maps.description:
**Map 2: The Talon [part2]**

Make sure you have the Talon Faction Mod installed to play this mission. [>> Get it here<<](https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/starcraft-time-splitters/files/2622657)

 

**Version 5 Update**

- Updated Mission 2 for compatibility with latest mod version.
- Fixed an issue where Volchron would not appear during the ending cinematic (hopefully)
- Changed functionality of the Golem to that of the Multiplayer Mod version. Golem can now choose between the Bane Golem and Steel Golem infusions. Temporary duration remains.

 

**Leave Feedback**
Please help make the mission better by leaving feedback [here.](https://www.sc2mapster.com/forums/player-zone/map-feedback/234707-starcraft-time-splitters-campaign-feedback) 

Thanks to all feedback received to date, the first map will now be officially released.

For special thanks: see main page.

maps.name: Mission Launcher V4
maps.description:
**Mission Launcher**

Mission Launcher for the Starcraft: Time Splitters campaign.

 

**Quick Installation**

- Unzip the zip-file.
- Copy the TS00_Launcher.sc2map file within the unzipped folder.
- Open your SC2 directory [by default it should be **C:/Program Flies/Starcraft II/** ]
- Open the **Maps** folder within your SC2 directory. If this folder does not exist, create a new folder and name it **Maps**.
- Inside the Maps folder, create a new folder with the name: **SCTimeSplitters**.
- Paste the TS00_Launcher.sc2map inside the SCTimeSplitters folder.
- Run SC2 editor and run the launcher.

 

**Leave Feedback**
Please help make the missions better by leaving feedback [here.](https://www.sc2mapster.com/forums/player-zone/map-feedback/234707-starcraft-time-splitters-campaign-feedback) 

For special thanks: see main page

maps.name: Talon Faction Mod V2.18
maps.description:
**Updated 27-06-2019**

Biocrafters Changes
- Added Crystalwing for the Biocrafters. Shard launching flyer trained from either the Portal or Stargate.
- Lancer Shard Launch ability changed. Shard Launch now deals 10 damage (+100 energy reduction) and also reduces vision to 2
 for a duration of 2 seconds. The ability now affects all enemy targets in a 3 radius area.

Forgers Changes
- Changed Dominator Quantum Reactor upgrade name to Dispersing Singularity.
- Added new Quantum Reactor upgrade for Dominator. Both air and ground attacks deal increased damage
 and can attack targets at 16 range. Weapon cooldown is however increased.

Cyber Initiative Changes
- Enlightend now deal 25 base damage, was 20 (+10 vs massive) to reduce overlap with Silent.
- Enlightend cost is now 250/125, was 250/100,
- Silent Null Charged Claw Missile upgrade changed. Now also increases damage dealth in impact area (radius 1.5)
- Fixed an issue where Enlightened were trained 4 at a time from the Portal

General Changes/Fixes
- Fixed entries where chosen warchest equipment would still be used.
- Added icons for upgradeable traits in the command card for all units.
